attributes.action: Recognise that disabled Children and disabled Adults have the same rights as "normal" children/adults.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why does it happen time and time again that disabled children/adults have to fight to get anywhere just because they are disabled.  The government go on about everyone who matters, what happened about the every Child Matters campaign. If you look around you, do you see the help and support that you would expect if you have a disabled child or children, NO there is nothing, it's not anywhere.  People have been disabled a lot longer than my son who is 4 years old.  

WE NEED  THEM TO LISTEN NOW, ANY PARENT WHO HAS A DISABLED CHILD OR CHILDREN, OR AN ADULT WHO IS IN THE SAME POSITION MIGHT NOT KNOW WHERE TO LOOK.  WE NEED  MORE ADVERTISING, MORE AWARENESS AND THE GOVERNMENT NEEDS TO ACT NOW BEFORE WE GET LOST IN THE SYSTEM".  

Why should we have to fight for our childrens future.
